body: Really bored at the moment (guess I shouldn't drink coffee before bed xD). Might as well do one of these to pass the time :p I'll try to answer anything asked. x)

replies.body:
Trying to stay alive. Doing more IRL things, kinda quit all types of video games ;p 

Great person to talk to back in Berzerk and even before that. Didn't realise I actually banned you a few times back then lol. Had a lot of fun during the tournament and in scrims, thanks for all those clutch plays xD When you joined PPB we didn't talk too much but still had some good times in the X-Rated chat. 

Miss ya too dude gl with AP exams btw.

Yellow.

Pizza. All mushrooms or Canadian style.

replies.body:
Still not sure tbh. Used it in a game called Freedom Force and as a password for my old pc. The numbers hold no significance to me just a bunch of randomness. 

Not enough being done to keep it from dying. Too many glitches for it to ever be popular again. 

Tbh half the officials suck. The server needs monthly events to keep it going.

Great dude, savaged pvper, and muzzer.

Started to play back in MCZone found it on the servers list website. Wasn't really active back then. Logged in one day found out the server switched to Avicus and I stuck around. xD

Chill dude, I don't talk to you often but you're really friendly in game.
